sections.text: Rice’s MStat provides rigorous training in statistical methods and data analysis for careers in academia, industry, and government.
The program emphasizes theoretical and applied statistics with electives aligned to research interests.

items: GRE not required; TOEFL/IELTS for international students
sections.text: Applicants must show strong quantitative preparation and submit standard application materials; GRE not required.
Graduates pursue roles as statisticians, data analysts, and researchers in government, academia, and private sector.
